sentences.sContent: Susan’s hobbies include reading, cooking, and drama.
sentences.sCn: 苏珊的业余爱好包括阅读、烹饪和戏剧。

sentences.sContent: Retirement gave him the time to pursue his hobbies.
sentences.sCn: 退休以后他有充裕的时间来做自己喜欢做的事。

sentences.sContent: ...A hobby often develops into a serious study of their habits...

words.tran: 业余爱好者；沉溺于某嗜好之人

trans.tranOther: an activity that you enjoy doing in your free time
